oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1864 May 20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife Martha relaying Confederate troop movements around Atlanta and asking for more letters from home, especially about the construction to the Wilder home in Greensburg, Indiana.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Atlanta Campaign, 1864; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
Forsyth, Riggs; Glawson, John; Stewart, John; Wilder, Mary
Confederate States of America. Army
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence with Martha Wilder, 1861-1865
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
